page.title: 10Family Recreation,Brickhill
page.content:
Members of the 200 families stated that they regularly took part in these sporting activities:-
{Football..20;Swimming..59;Netball...3 {Lacrosse...2;Angling....5;Hockey....0 {Judo......11;Riding.....5;Wt.Train..8 {Athletics..5;Tennis.....2;Keep Fit..3 {Sailing....6;Cycling....3;Rowing....2 {Canoeing...1;Flying.....2;Dancing...4 {Sub-aqua...2;Golf......16;Squash...14 {Cricket...11;Rugby......7;Badminton19 {Jogging....5;Gymnastics.9;T.Tennis..4 {Rounders...1;Aerobics...4. { Other regular activities were:- {Took part in musical activities....44 {Attended musical concerts..........35 {Members of amateur dramatics.......10 {Attended theatrical productions....37 {Attended clubs (Scouts, W.I.,etc.).62 {Attended place of worship..........51
